name: Ephemeral Mark
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You mark two objects or creatures of similar shape, one of which can be yourself. Marked targets become washed out in color, appearing as a bland gray.

On successive turns, you can use 1 AP to switch the location of the marked targets with each other.

The spell ends early if a target moves 300 feet away from you or another target.
empower: You can target up to five objects or creatures this way. Each one must be of similar shape. You can switch the locations of any or all targets.
